Nautiloid.title: Don't rescue Us until after killing Int Dev upstairs
Prisoners
Nautiloid.description: Click middle button on console to free them.

Crash Site.title: Kill dying mindflayer from range
Crash Site.description: In crashed mindflayer ship. Do not initiate conversation; more XP this way.

Crash Site.title: Do not trigger XXP zone near chest above crash site
Lae'zel area: Betray Tieflings in dialogue, then K/O them
Do not trigger XXP zone at Ancient Ruins/Withers Tomb
Crash Site.description: We will enter Withers Tomb through the bottom to avoid triggering Exploration XP.

Crash Site.title: Enter Withers Tomb through CR20 door on Beach
Enter side room of Withers Tomb (+10xp)
Interact with locked door in side room (+5xp)
Withers Tomb topside: Gimblebock
Crash Site.description: Persuade them to leave, then attack in TB mode.

Crash Site.title: Persuade guy at Withers main entrance to let you in
Withers Tomb inside: dumb door guard
First goblin attack at Grove entrance
Crash Site.description: Don't let any good guys die

Crash Site.title: Cult Siblings
Crash Site.description:
- Send them after Owlbear
- Switch to TB mode as they are running, and attack them
- Loot mindflayer parasite

Druid Grove.title: Read book about Withers Tomb near Aron (+15xp)
Speak with Animals + bored ox + haypile (+15xp)
Recognize Mattis scam with Warlock or Wizard (+45xp)
Mattis: Catch Silfy stealing (high PER) (+25xp)
Druid Grove.description: You can't use the same character you used to recognize the scam.

Druid Grove.title: Alfira DUrge event (read description!)
Druid Grove.description:
- Cross bridge towards abandoned village
- Long rest ONLY after you have crossed the bridge.

You will kill Quil and get your DUrge cloak. Alfira will live.

Druid Grove.title: Meli steals Barth's locket
Druid Grove.description: Be sure to tell Barth not to hit Meli.

Druid Grove.title: Return Barth's locket (+15xp)
Druid Grove.description: Steal it back from Mol's stash underground, then give it to him.

Druid Grove.title: Get Amulet of Sylvanus
Druid Grove.description: Move Flat rock near Ormn bear

Druid Grove.title: Report Arabella's rescue to her parents
DO NOT free Sazza yet
Druid Grove.description: We need to save Smythen in the Goblin Camp first.

Druid Grove.title: Free Sazza
Druid Grove.description:
- Antagonize and K/O the tieflings guarding her
- Chat her up
- Unlock her cage

Druid Grove.title: Escort Sazza through tunnels, save Findal
Druid Grove.description: Save dying Findal with a healing potion/spell for Wyll insp + useful stuff later

Druid Grove.title: Report to Zevlor for Hellrider gloves
Finish business with Ethel in Grove
Druid Grove.description: Buy potions, etc. She will leave soon.

Druid Grove.title: Read wall carvings in Sanctum, pass INT checks
Nettie poisoning encounter
Druid Grove.description:
- Get poisoned by Nettie
- Attack and knock her out
- After encounter, drink an Antidote to get rid of the poison

Druid Grove.title: Kagha + Shadow Druids
Druid Grove.description:
- Persuade Kagha to join your side (we will KO her later)
- KO Findal and Bossk during the fight if possible

Druid Grove.title: Steal Idol of Sylvanus
Druid Grove.description: - Move it out of Druid LOS using Mage Hand and steal it while stealthed

Druid Grove.title: Give Idol to Mol for Ring of Protection
Steal Idol of Sylvanus back from Mol

Woodlands.title: Do not cross bridge into Woodlands
Woodlands.description: Triggers DUrge event; don't do this until Alfira is K/O'd

Woodlands.title: Do not go to Swamp yet
Woodlands.description: Wait until you have done everything you need with her in the Grove and are ready to fight the Redcaps.

Woodlands.title: Get fooled by Ethel on way to house, KO brothers
Owlbear encounter
Woodlands.description:
- Try to kill mate first, then mother
- If cub is stuck aggro, run away from combat

Blighted Village.title: Disguise as Drow, resolve ambush peacefully (+??? xp)
Village goblins
Blighted Village.description:
- Avoid ogres
- Avoid barcus wroot area

Blighted Village.title: Ogres
Blighted Village.description:
- Offer them blood (DC20 persuasion) for dUrge XP
- Enter TB mode QUICKLY after persuading them
- Kill them for loot (headband of intellect in particular)

Blighted Village.title: Windmill/Barcus
Blighted Village.description:
- Disguise as Drow and the goblins will flee
- While they are fleeing, enter TB mode and attack
- Kill Fezzerk LAST, otherwise the others vanish for some reason
- Then free Barcus for Wyll insp

Blighted Village.title: Apothecary basement skeletons
Blighted Village.description: Make sure to let the skeletons free all the others from their coffins.

Blighted Village.title: Read Shovel scroll
Blighted Village.description:
- Warlock, Wizard, or non-Storm Sorc
- Do not scribe the scroll, read it
- Give correct answers

Blighted Village.title: Get Shovel permanently
Blighted Village.description: Talk to her with valid character after walking past mirror.

Blighted Village.title: Use Knock on Thay before getting keygem (+75xp)
Phase Spider Matriarch
Blighted Village.description: Let her hatch ALL of her eggs. Each small spider gives additional XP.

Blighted Village.title: Don't pick up Thay key gem yet
Get key gem for Necromancy of Thay
Read all apprentice journals found in spider lair
Jump into Underdark from bottom of spider lair
Drop Necromancy of Thay on ground and read it
Blighted Village.description:
- Difficult saving throws
- Adds speak with dead passive

Blighted Village.title: Destroy Necromancy of Thay with radiant damage
Blighted Village.description: Spawns 3 Shadows. Holy water doesnt work, use e.g. Guiding Bolt

Blighted Village.title: Get Infernal Iron from forge basement

Goblin Camp.title: Talk your way into Goblin Camp
Talk your way into the Goblin Fort
Rescue Smythen (+35xp)
Goblin Camp.description:
- Quickly run to his location
- Enter TB mode
- Apply Invisibility to him
- He SHOULD run out the door triggering the inspiration and the XP

Goblin Camp.title: Get hidden treasures on temple battlements
Kill Crusher outside camp on bridge
Clear goblin vendor (he will die soon)
DO NOT kill any courtyard goblins yet
Outdoor Goblin Massacre (read description!)
Goblin Camp.description:
- Start combat with non-Durge character, by shooting a goblin other than Mirg
- Have DUrge use a Scroll of Fireball to kill 5+ goblins for Insp
- Avoid killing Mirg
- When Mirg is the only one remaining, run away from combat

Goblin Camp.title: Outdoor cleanup
Goblin Camp.description: Kill stray guards and any mobs still lingering after massacre.

Goblin Camp.title: DO NOT trigger Dror Ragzlin seance
Get tricked by Priestess Gut
Goblin Camp.description:
- Get tricked by Gut so you are imprisoned in her quarters
- Bring your party in to rescue you
- Kill Gut and her ogress
- Loot parasite

Goblin Camp.title: Get Absolute's Brand for everyone from Warlock Greez
Solve moon puzzle
Goblin Camp.description: You may want to delay this for later for abusing Gale insp for lever

Goblin Camp.title: Go to Underdark via Selunite Temple
Goblin Camp.description: Either solve the moon puzzle or pull the hidden switch.

Goblin Camp.title: Free Magubliet priest, then kill him
Get treasures hidden in roof/top entrance of fort
Release Spiders on Goblins (see description!)
Goblin Camp.description:
- Convince the spiders to attack the goblins
- Join the combat by assaulting Gribbo nonlethally (may need to shove her into proper position)
- This should create a situation where there are 5 neutral units
- Kill them all in one round for DUrge insp
- Once that is unlocked, kill everyone

Goblin Camp.title: Go to Worg Pens, massacre goblins, free Halsin
Goblin Camp.description:
- Begin combat by killing the goblin(s) outside Halsin's cage. Otherwise he kills them during cutscene and you lose the XP.
- Tell Halsin to wait here in the worg pens.

Goblin Camp.title: Finish business with Roah Moonglow
Goblin Camp.description: We will KO her before the Goblin siege

Goblin Camp.title: Do not talk to Minthara yet
Set up Grove Raid with Minthara

Rizzin Road.title: Harper skeletons under bridge
Rizzin Road.description: Can come back later for this if using Gale to push past level boundary

Rizzin Road.title: Kill paladins
Rizzin Road.description: Don't bring Karlach, she destroys the building

Rizzin Road.title: Flind and Zhents
Rizzin Road.description: Kill Zhents after killing Flind and gnoll group

Rizzin Road.title: Discover hidden stash E of Waukeen (+25xp)
Rizzin Road.description: sometimes I don't get this, not sure what triggers it.

Waukeen's Rest.title: Interact with Flaming Fist at door whlie they are pushing it (+25xp)
Speak with Dead on dead drow, ask about Moonrise (+20xp)
Talk your way into Zhent Hideout
Give Zhent chest to Zarys (READ DESCRIPTION)
Waukeen's Rest.description:
- Give chest to Zarys
- Within the ensuing dialogue, buy out her inventory.
- DO NOT leave dialogue without clearing her inventory.

Underdark.title: Kill steal Minotaur being lasered at Selunite Temple entrance

Meta.title: I understand the assignment
Meta.description:
- Only do tasks that are shown as available to you. Do not go off on your own or you may trigger unintended events early, breaking the route.
- You can avoid checking off tasks marked DELAY or AVOID as a reminder to yourself to delay or avoid certain things.
- This is a Dark Urge playthrough. Other origins may require significant adjustments and will not get as much XP.
- This is a "good-aligned" playthrough. DUrge is done with minimal kills, we recruit Will, we save Last Light. Some of these things result in less XP than is strictly possible.
- Only major loot items will be marked. It is expected you will loot or not loot random junk as you see fit.

Meta.title: Kill 5 enemies in 1 round
Meta.description: This can be done easily by using a Fireball scroll while massacring the main Goblin Camp area. See that section for details.

Meta.title: Kill 5 neutrals in 1 round
Meta.description: Best place to do this is in Goblin Camp when freeing spiders.

Meta.title: Kill Gale and revive him via his ritual
